title: Where can those bulky pieces of styrofoam packing materials be recycled in NH County?  Hate to keep tossing them in the trash!
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. Tegrant Corporation, in Butner, N.C., recycles foam packaging 919-575-5100 There's no local collection point, but they do have some sort of program where you can mail back packaging to them. More info: http://www.epspackaging.org/
